statements: SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_history
SELECT customer_id, product_id, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM customer_purchase_history
SELECT product_id, purchase_amount, customer_id, purchase_date FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount > 100
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM customer_purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM customer_purchase_history ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM customer_purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_id, AVG(purchase_amount) AS avg_purchase_amount FROM customer_purchase_history GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY avg_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(product_id) AS total_purchases FROM customer_purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchases > 5;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(purchase_date) AS latest_purchase_date FROM customer_purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY latest_purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_history;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM customer_purchase_history;
SELECT product_id, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM customer_purchase_history;
SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT suggestion_id, suggestion_text FROM product_suggestions;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT product_id, suggestion_text FROM product_suggestions WHERE suggestion_id = 3 ORDER BY product_id
SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, product_id, purchase_amount FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY customer_id
SELECT customer_id, product_id, purchase_amount FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE customer_id IN (101, 102, 103) ORDER BY customer_id
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2
SELECT product_id, name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT customer_id, product_id, amount FROM purchases WHERE amount > 100
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT p.name, p.category, pr.amount FROM products p JOIN purchases pr ON p.product_id = pr.product_id;
SELECT c.name, p.name, pr.amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases pr ON c.customer_id = pr.customer_id JOIN products p ON pr.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.name, SUM(pr.amount) as total_spent FROM customers c JOIN purchases pr ON c.customer_id = pr.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM products ORDER BY category ASC, product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchases.quantity > 5 ORDER BY address ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, suggested_product_id, suggestion_date FROM customers c JOIN suggestions s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price <= 100.00;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, quantity FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, rating FROM customers INNER JOIN ratings ON customers.customer_id = ratings.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE quantity > 1;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, rating FROM customers JOIN ratings ON customers.customer_id = ratings.customer_id JOIN products ON ratings.product_id = products.product_id WHERE rating > 3;
